latest news.eng_title: Salem's Lot Gets October Release On Max
latest news.summary: The Max streaming service has announced that the new adaptation of Stephen King's vampire novel 'Salem's Lot will be released in October. The film, directed by Gary Dauberman, has had a rocky road to release, with original dates set for April 2022 and April 2023 being pushed back due to post-production delays caused by the pandemic. The film stars Lewis Pullman, Alfre Woodard, and Pilou Asbæk, among others, and is described as a horror film. According to the streaming service, the film will finally see the light of day in October, following months of limbo about its status.
latest news.title: Salem's Lot Gets October Release On Max

latest news.eng_title: Here's How House of the Dragon Season 3 Will Start
latest news.summary: House of the Dragon Season 3 is expected to begin with a major battle, the Battle of the Gullet, from George R.R. Martin's book Fire & Blood. In the book, the Battle of the Gullet occurs before the Fall of King's Landing, where Rhaenyra and Daemon Targaryen sack the city and Rhaenyra sits on the Iron Throne. The battle is a major defeat for team Black, with Jacaerys Velaryon being killed and one of Rhaenyra's sons being captured. The battle also results in the destruction of Driftmark and the loss of a third of the Velaryon fleet's ships. According to the book, the Battle of the Gullet is the first real test that Rhaenyra's new dragonriders face, and it will likely occur very early in Season 3, potentially even in the first episode. HBO has not officially confirmed the start of Season 3, but fans can get a good idea of what to expect by reading Fire & Blood. As HBO said, 'It is impossible to tell exactly what the start of House of the Dragon Season 3 will look like, but when diving into George R.R. Martin's Fire & Blood, viewers can get a pretty good idea of what to expect.'
latest news.title: Here's How House of the Dragon Season 3 Will Start

latest news.eng_title: Some Disappointing News About ‘House Of The Dragon' Season 3's Release Date
latest news.summary: House of the Dragon season 3 will not start filming until 'earlyish 2025', according to showrunner Ryan Condal. Based on the previous season's filming and release schedule, this would put the release date at either April 2026 or June 2026. This is a significant delay compared to Game of Thrones, which had exact, year-long gaps between seasons for most of its run. The article argues that production in Hollywood is slowing down due to ballooning expenses and stretched-out timelines, leading to frustration among fans. It notes that even big-budget series are now experiencing 18-24 month gaps between seasons, and that House of the Dragon's delay is not an exception. As the article's author says, 'It's ridiculous' that it's taking so long to produce and release new seasons of TV shows.
latest news.title: Some Disappointing News About ‘House Of The Dragon' Season 3's Release Date

latest news.eng_title: Martin Lewis in urgent £120 message to Octopus, Ovo, British Gas and E.on customers, EDF
latest news.summary: Martin Lewis has urged people to take immediate action after the decision by Ofgem to raise the price cap for energy from October 1 this year. The price cap will increase from £1,568 a year to £1,717 for a household with typical power usage. Martin Lewis, founder & chair of MoneySavingExpert.com, said prices are about double what they were before the energy crisis started. He warned that the vast majority of homes in England, Scotland & Wales will see costs jump 10% - so for every £100 you pay today, you'll typically pay £110. Lewis urged people to switch to cheaper deals, saying that prices for some deals still available were 7 per cent less than the new October cap - meaning people could save about £120. He also suggested using whole-of-market comparison tools, like MSE's Cheap Energy Club, to find the cheapest fix for their use and location. Lewis expressed concerns about the Government's decision to means-test Winter Fuel Payments, which will leave many pensioners missing out on a further £200 to £300.
latest news.title: Martin Lewis in urgent £120 message to Octopus, Ovo, British Gas and E.on customers, EDF

latest news.eng_title: George R.R. Martin's Regrets: A Mistake Made with HBO

Media: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
A Song of Ice and Fire

keywords: A Song of Ice and Fire
latest news.summary: George R.R. Martin, author of the A Song of Ice and Fire series, has spoken about a major mistake he made when signing with HBO. Martin, who is also a producer on the series House of the Dragon and A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms, regrets that the success of Game of Thrones created high expectations for the final two books in the series. He also expressed regret over another mistake he made during the production of the first season of Game of Thrones. 'I probably made a mistake when we made Game of Thrones a TV show,' Martin said. 'We used a lot of unknown actors, and they did a lot of promotion with me. It really made my face well-known, which wasn't necessarily the best thing in the world.' Martin now finds himself recognized everywhere he goes, and he seems to be seeking some peace and quiet. 'I used to be able to go to McDonald's and get a cheeseburger without anyone recognizing me,' he said. 'But that's over now.'
latest news.title: Game of Thrones : George R.R. Martin reconnait cette grosse erreur qu'il a faite

latest news.eng_title: Disney+ September 2024 Releases: A Marvel Series and More

Product: LEGO Star Wars: Reconstruire la Galaxie

latest news.summary: Disney+ has confirmed its upcoming releases for September 2024, including a highly anticipated Marvel series. The most notable release in August 2024 will soon be available, with the return of the cast of 'Only Murders in the Building' for season 4. The series will revolve around the murder of Sazz Pataki, the double of Charles-Haden Savage (Steve Martin). The first episode will be released on September 27, 2024, while the remaining nine episodes will be released between September and October. Another highly anticipated series is 'Agatha All Along', which is centered around the villain from 'WandaVision' played by Kathryn Hahn. 'Now stripped of all power, the infamous Agatha Harkness is nothing more than a shadow of her former self. Until the day a gothic teenager helps her to break free from this tangled curse. Agatha's interest is piqued when he begs her to walk with him along the legendary Witches' Road, a mythical path consisting of a series of magical challenges that, if overcome, reward any sorceress with what she lacks.' The series will be released on September 18, 2024. Other releases include 'LEGO Star Wars: Reconstruire la Galaxie' on September 13, 2024, and 'In Vogue: The 90s' on September 4 and 20, 2024.
latest news.title: Disney+ : les sorties confirmées de septembre 2024 avec une série attendue

latest news.eng_title: Game of Thrones: The Knight of the Seven Kingdoms - A New Spin-Off
latest news.summary: A new spin-off of Game of Thrones, titled 'The Knight of the Seven Kingdoms', is set to be released on HBO Max in 2025. The series will follow the adventures of a knight and his young squire, set in the Targaryen era, before the events of Game of Thrones and after the events of House of the Dragon. The story will focus on the struggles of the Targaryen family for control of the Seven Kingdoms. The main cast includes Peter Claffey as Ser Duncan the Tall, Dexter Sol Ansell as Egg, and Bertie Carvel as Prince Baelor Targaryen. George R.R. Martin has joined the project as an executive producer. The series will explore the complexities of the characters and the events they face, offering a narrative full of unexpected twists and turns. 'It's a great day to be a fan of Game of Thrones,' said an anonymous fan, 'the universe is expanding and we can't wait to see what's next.'
latest news.title: Esto es todo lo que se sabe sobre el nuevo spin-off de Juego de Tronos: El Caballero de los Siete Reinos

latest news.eng_title: Les Anneaux de Pouvoir, Season 2: Release Dates for Prime Video Episodes
latest news.summary: The second season of 'The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power', a series inspired by J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Lord of the Rings', will be available on Prime Video from August 29 to October 3, 2024. The series follows the story of Galadriel, Gil-galad, Duron, Elrond, Nori, Celebrimbor, and Sauron as they try to counter Sauron's plans. The first season, which consisted of 8 episodes, was released in 2022. The second season will consist of 8 episodes, with the first three episodes available on the first day, August 29, 2024. The episodes will be released on a weekly basis, with the final episode available on October 3, 2024. Fans can look forward to a third season, which has already been confirmed by Amazon.
latest news.title: "Les Anneaux de Pouvoir", saison 2 : quelles sont les dates de diffusion des épisodes sur Prime Video ?

latest news.eng_title: 4 Game of Thrones Spin-Offs That Should Be Adapted Instead of A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
latest news.summary: The success of Game of Thrones and House of the Dragon suggests that projects with a literary basis have a better chance of survival in George R. R. Martin's on-screen universe. Four alternative storylines for spin-offs have been proposed, including Arya Stark's future, which offers endless creative possibilities as she sets off to explore the western lands beyond the Sunset Sea. Martin's map ends abruptly at the Sunset Sea, leaving room for new lands, discoveries, heroes, intrigue, and adventure in each episode.
latest news.title: 4 Game of Thrones Spin-Offs That Should Be Adapted Instead of A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms

news knowledge.eng_title: Mysterious 'Winds of Winter' Amazon Alert Sparks Rumors of Imminent Release Date
news knowledge.summary: Some Amazon and Kindle users received a notification that 'The Winds of Winter' by George R.R. Martin was 'recently released' and available for purchase. However, when readers tried to follow up on the alert, they encountered an error message. The notification was likely a placeholder for the actual book, which has been in the works for years. Fans are speculating that the notification might be a sign that the book is finally being released, especially with the upcoming release of a new box set in October. Martin has not confirmed the release date, but has hinted that there will be a big announcement when the book is done. He has also shared that the book will reveal more about why and how dragons bond with men, a topic that was explored in the second season of 'House of the Dragon'.
news knowledge.title: Mysterious 'Winds of Winter' Amazon Alert Sparks Rumors of Imminent Release Date

news knowledge.eng_title: George R.R. Martin's Winds of Winter: A Long-Awaited Saga

Title: Winds of Winter
Fire & Blood
Product: A Song of Ice and Fire

keywords: A Song of Ice and Fire
news knowledge.summary: George R.R. Martin, author of the A Song of Ice and Fire series, has been working on the sixth and penultimate book, Winds of Winter, for years. Despite initial promises of a 2014 release, the book remains unfinished. Martin has stated that the book is complex and will likely be longer than previous volumes. The translation process will take several months, and the translator, Cristina Macía, has not received any information about the book's status or release date. Fans are eagerly awaiting the book's completion, but there is no official release date yet. Martin has also expanded the world of A Song of Ice and Fire with the publication of Fire & Blood, a prequel about the Targaryen dynasty, which has been adapted into a TV series.
news knowledge.title: George R.R Martin se lo toma con calma: 'Juego de tronos' todavía no ve su final

news knowledge.eng_title: Check Out George R.R. Martin's Stunning New 'Game Of Thrones' Covers: 'Raw And Gritty Quality — Right For This World'

Media: A Song of Ice and Fire

keywords: A Song of Ice and Fire
news knowledge.summary: George R.R. Martin has unveiled a new set of covers for his A Song of Ice and Fire series, featuring artwork created using traditional linocut and woodcut techniques. The covers, designed by Mark Seekins, Tim Green, and David G. Stevenson, have a 'raw and gritty quality' that Martin believes fits the stories. The boxed set will be available in October 2024, but pricing details have not been announced. The announcement has sparked questions about the progress of the next installment, The Winds of Winter, which Martin is still working on.
news knowledge.title: Check Out George R.R. Martin's Stunning New 'Game Of Thrones' Covers: 'Raw And Gritty Quality — Right For This World'

news knowledge.eng_title: George R. R. Martin's Latest Statements on 'Winter Winds' Give No Cause for Optimism

Event: A Song of Ice and Fire

keywords: A Song of Ice and Fire
news knowledge.summary: George R. R. Martin, author of the 'A Song of Ice and Fire' series, has given an update on the status of 'Winter Winds', the sixth book in the series. Martin has stated that he works on the book when he can and is ready, and that there will be no rumors or announcements until it is finished. He has also clarified that his travels and meetings with editors and agents do not necessarily mean he is working on the book. Martin has been traveling and meeting with editors and agents in various countries, including Germany, Italy, Spain, Finland, Brazil, Japan, and Egypt, but this does not mean he is making progress on 'Winter Winds'. Fans have been waiting for the book for 12 years since the release of 'A Dance with Dragons' in 2011.
news knowledge.title: Las últimas declaraciones de George R. R. Martin sobre ‘Vientos de Invierno' no dan para ser optimista

news knowledge.eng_title: George R.R. Martin Reveals New Covers for A Song of Ice and Fire Series

Media: A Song of Ice and Fire

keywords: A Song of Ice and Fire
news knowledge.summary: George R.R. Martin has revealed the new covers for the A Song of Ice and Fire series, including Game of Thrones. The new covers, designed by Mark Seekins and Tim Green, feature linocut and xylography art, which Martin describes as having a 'crude and sandy quality' that fits well with the stories. The covers will be available online and in stores in October 2024, although the price has not been announced. Martin is still working on the final two books in the series, with The Winds of Winter, the next installment, having been delayed for over 10 years. Martin has stated that he has written 1,100 pages of the book, but still has much work to do before it is complete.
news knowledge.title: George R.R. Martin desvela las nuevas portadas de Juego de Tronos y Canción de Hielo y Fuego

news knowledge.eng_title: George R.R. Martin Reveals New Covers for A Game of Thrones and Whole Song of Ice and Fire Series

Media: A Song of Ice and Fire

keywords: A Song of Ice and Fire
news knowledge.summary: George R.R. Martin has revealed new covers for the A Game of Thrones and A Song of Ice and Fire book series. The new covers, designed by linocut artist Mark Seekins and designer Tim Green, feature a raw and gritty quality that captures the vastness of Westeros. The boxed set will be available in October 2024, but no price has been announced. The set does not include the entire A Song of Ice and Fire story, as Martin is still working on the final two books, including The Winds of Winter, which has been delayed for over 10 years. Martin has said that he has written 1,100 pages of the book, but still has much work to do before its release.
news knowledge.title: George R.R. Martin Reveals New Covers for A Game of Thrones and Whole Song of Ice and Fire Series

news knowledge.eng_title: George RR Martin Has An Update On The Winds Of Winter

Title: Jon Snow
Product: The Song of Ice and Fire

keywords: The Song of Ice and Fire
news knowledge.summary: George R.R. Martin has provided an update on The Winds of Winter, stating that there will be a big announcement when the book is finished, but did not provide a timeline for its completion or release. Martin clarified that his meeting with his editor did not signify any significant progress on the book. Fans have been waiting for over a decade for the next novel in The Song of Ice and Fire series, which is expected to pick up where A Dance With Dragons and A Feast for Crows left off, with the characters of Jon Snow, Daenerys Targaryen, and Tyrion Lannister facing uncertain fates.
news knowledge.title: George RR Martin Has An Update On The Winds Of Winter

news knowledge.eng_title: George R. R. Martin Asks Fans to Calm Down About The Winds of Winter Release

Product: A Song of Ice and Fire

keywords: A Song of Ice and Fire
news knowledge.summary: George R. R. Martin, author of the A Song of Ice and Fire series, has addressed the pressure from fans regarding the release of The Winds of Winter. In a recent blog post, Martin clarified that his meetings with his editor do not necessarily mean the book is finished, and that he is still working on it. He also mentioned that he has written 1,100 pages of the book, but there is still a long way to go. Martin also announced that he will continue to work on the Tales of Dunk and Egg series, which will be adapted into a HBO series in 2025. He asked fans to calm down and not speculate about the release date, stating that 'nobody will know, but there will be a big announcement'.
news knowledge.title: "Ninguém saberá, mas haverá um grande anúncio": George R. R. Martin avisa que fãs não devem especular tanto sobre lançamento de Os Ventos do Inverno

news knowledge.eng_title: George RR Martin Offers a New Update on THE WINDS OF WINTER and Surprise! It's Still Not Done — GeekTyrant

Event: A Song of Ice and Fire

keywords: A Song of Ice and Fire
news knowledge.summary: George RR Martin, author of A Song of Ice and Fire, has provided an update on his upcoming novel The Winds of Winter, stating that it is still not finished. Martin clarified that meeting with his British publishers does not signify the novel's completion, and that there will be a big announcement when it is done. He also shared an update on the Game of Thrones stage play, set to open in London in 2025, which will be another prequel to the main novels and TV show.
news knowledge.title: George RR Martin Offers a New Update on THE WINDS OF WINTER and Surprise! It's Still Not Done — GeekTyrant

news knowledge.eng_title: ‘Winds of Winter' Just Got Yet Another Depressing Update
news knowledge.summary: George R.R. Martin has provided an update on the progress of 'The Winds of Winter', stating that the novel is still in the works and no release date has been set. Martin has squashed speculations about the novel's completion after a recent trip to London, explaining that communication with editors and publishers is a standard part of the publishing process. He reassured fans that any good news about the novel will be announced, but for now, a release date cannot be confirmed. Martin has previously announced that the novel is 'three-quarters of the way done' and has released the first 11 chapters online.
news knowledge.title: ‘Winds of Winter' Just Got Yet Another Depressing Update
